### Defence Construction Canada – Request for Proposal

**Project Title: Smart Building Program – Regional Standing Offer, Western Region**
**Project Number: MP2016-79154**

**Overview**
Defence Construction Canada (DCC) is seeking proposals from qualified firms to establish a regional standing offer (SO) for the Smart Building Program in the Western Region. The selected contractor will provide services on an "as and when required" basis to the Department of National Defence (DND) for a period of up to 2 years, with the option to extend for up to 3 additional years.

**Services Required**
The contractor will provide services for the installation of automation control devices, energy management controls, and other related services for the DND locations in the Western Region of Canada, including Manitoba, Alberta, and Saskatchewan.

**Evaluation Criteria**
Proposals will be evaluated based on the established criteria outlined in the request for proposal (RFP) document, including technical merit and price.

**Background**
DCC is seeking a qualified contractor to provide the required services under a regional standing offer (SO). The selected contractor will be required to meet the security requirements outlined in the RFP document.

**Solicitation Documents**
All solicitation documents, including the RFP, can be obtained from the MERX electronic procurement system.

**Proposal Submission**
Proposals must be submitted through the MERX electronic bidding system on or before the closing date and time indicated on the system.

**Contact Information**
For more information regarding this request for proposal, please contact Amanda Eid at amanda.eid@dcc-cdc.gc.ca or (343) 540-6713.

**Accountability and Trade Agreements**
This procurement is subject to the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), and the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA).
